Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires sellers to clearly post the price of a credit card surcharge
Summary: Requires sellers to clearly post the credit card price inclusive of any surcharge at the location a sale occurs.
LawCode: Amd ยง518, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring sellers to clearly post the price of a credit card surcharge
